CHAT.comment: Chi and Mot don't really play together at all; Chi plays while Mot looks on. Still , there is a pleasant atmosphere and Mot seems to be proud of Chi. The only mention of the properties of magnets is when Mot says <remember the different sides of a magnet , Chi>. Chi experiments a little with the magnets on her own , noticing when certain pieces don't stick. EXP's participation , through comments and laughter during particular situations , isn't extensive but it is almost as much as Mot's. Video does not start until later; transcription until then is solely from audio

Time is 14:35. Set up of and introduction to magnet activity , some talk about videotaping; tells them it will just be their hands; Mot and EXP have a conversation about videotaping and the camera; Chi enters occasionally with comments

u.a: video starts here

Chi and Mot sit in what appears to be the living room; the magnets are spread out on a coffee table; Mot plays with the black base which is in the center of the table and on top of which are the yellow , red , orange , and black balls; Chi is holding the yellow wand and using it to pick up different objects
removes a washer from the black base

g.ga: the red flat plastic lego pieces

u.a: touches the yellow wand to a flat plastic lego piece
sets plastic orange man on the table .
picks up plastic orange man and touches it to the yellow wand
sets orange man down onto black base
touches the plastic turtle to the yellow wand and then sets it back down
touches the square magnet to the yellow wand; they stick to each other
puts a triangle on the yellow wand on top of the square magnet , then puts a washer on top of those pieces
removes triangle , square , and washer from the yellow wand and puts a silver man on the yellow wand
places a silver man in an upright position on the black base
the silver man falls
places a silver man on top of the shoulders of another silver man which stands on the black base
picks up silver man from the table
low scratchy voice
places a third silver man on top of the other two
low scratchy voice again
removes a paper clip from the side of the black base
places the fourth silver man on top of the tower
places the fifth silver man on top of the tower
the silver man tower falls
places the purple star on the black base
the star is painted purple on one side only; the painted side is not as magnetically strong as the unpainted side
turns the star so that the purple side of the star touches the surface of the black base and moves the star around
aft picks up the black ball and the yellow ball and then puts the yellow ball on top of the star , and the black ball on the table
takes the sheep from Chi's hands
the sheep appears to be made by hand
puts the lamb onto the black base
places a washer on top of the yellow ball , but the washer won't stay on the yellow ball
Chi is frustrated because the washer won't stay on the yellow ball

g.ga: not staying on the yellow ball

u.a: a silver man with the red ball on it's head stands on the purple star
holds the yellow wand over the red ball; the red ball and the silver man collapse onto the black base
the yellow wand sticks to the black base and is difficult for Chi to remove
the black base is lifted up with the yellow wand and the yellow and black balls stick to the bottom of the black base
the yellow and black balls which are underneath the black base
low scratchy voice
removes balls from the underside of the black base
removes objects from the black base
places a silver man at the edge of the coffee table

g.ga: closer to Chi , at the edge of the coffee table

u.a: Chi places yellow wand underneath the coffee table , under the silver man which is on top of the coffee table; she moves the yellow wand around which causes the silver man to move also
moves a pile of nuts , washers , and other silver men away from the silver man Chi is moving with the yellow wand
puts a nut next to the silver man and tries to move the nut and silver man; the nut does not move so Chi moves it away and continues moving silver man
sets yellow wand on table
aft picks up flat red lego piece and a silver stick; tries to make silver stick stand up on the lego piece
puts a yellow triangle onto the black base
stands a silver man on the black base
bef stacks balls on top of each other; they all stick together
holds up chain of balls to her ear

g.ga: a nut and another piece which isn't visible

u.a: holds the nut in one hand and the other piece in the other hand , and touches the two pieces together
stacks pieces on the black base for 27 seconds
shrugs shoulders
continues stacking and arranging pieces on the black base for 30 seconds
repositions a nut on the black base with some effort; in the process , Chi knocks down a silver man
attaches a square magnet to the silver man's hands

g.ga: the silver man holding the square magnet

u.a: Chi puts a triangle on the silver man
removes pieces from the black base
stacks silver men in a pyramid
places the fifth silver man at the top of the pyramid
rearranges pyramid of silver men
turns the top silver man upside down

g.ga: onto the top of the pyramid

u.a: takes down the pyramid of silver men
